resources.string: Qwant Junior Mobile is a fun, safe and fluid browsing experience for kids.
Keep your kids safe when surfing the Internet
Qwant Junior hides inapropriate content such violence, porn, drugs, hate, and other search engines that may display these contents.
Tracking protection built-in for better privacy and less ads
Qwant Junior neither tracks nor collects any data about your kid. Your kid\'s data will never be used to make money.
